original: āryāvalokiteśvarabodhisattvo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caryāṃ caramāṇo vyavalokayati sma /
analyzed: ārya avalokiteśvara bodhisattvaḥ gambhīrāyām prajñāpāramitāyām caryām caramāṇaḥ vyavalokayati sma
tān ca svabhāva śūnyān paśyati sma
evam eva vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāra vijñānāni

original: ihaṃ śāriputra sarvadharmāḥ śūnyatālakṣaṇā anutpannā aniruddhā amalā na vimalā nonā na paripūrṇāḥ /
analyzed: iham śāriputra sarva dharmāḥ śūnyatā lakṣaṇāḥ an utpannāḥ a niruddhāḥ amalāḥ na vimalāḥ na ūnāḥ na paripūrṇāḥ
na cakṣuḥ śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāya manāṃsi
na rūpa śabda gandha rasa spraṣṭavya dharmāḥ
na cakṣuḥ dhātuḥ yāvat na manaḥ dhātuḥ

original: na vidyā nāvidyā na vidyākṣayo nāvidyākṣayo yāvanna jarāmaraṇaṃ na jarāmaraṇakṣayo na duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgā na jñānaṃ na prāptitvam //
analyzed: na vidyā na avidyā na vidyā kṣayaḥ na avidyā kṣayaḥ yāvat na jarā maraṇam na jarā maraṇa kṣayaḥ na duḥkha samudaya nirodha mārgāḥ na jñānam na prāpti tvam
citta āvaraṇa nāstitvāt atrastaḥ viparyāsa atikrāntaḥ niṣṭha nirvāṇaḥ
tri adhva vyavasthitāḥ sarva buddhāḥ prajñāpāramitām āśritya anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ

original: tasmājjñātavyaḥ prajñāpāramitāmahāmantro mahāvidyāmantro 'nuttaramantro 'samasamamantraḥ sarvaduḥkhapraśamanaḥ satyamamithyatvāt prajñāpāramitāyāmukto  #
analyzed: tasmāt jñātavyaḥ prajñāpāramitā mahā mantraḥ mahāvidyā mantraḥ samasama mantraḥ sarva duḥkha praśamanaḥ satyam a mithya tvāt prajñāpāramitāyām uktaḥ
